high_signal_items.title: Explainable Patterns in Cryptocurrency Microstructure
high_signal_items.why_it_matters: The study provides insights into stable cross-asset patterns in cryptocurrency microstructure, suggesting a portable microstructure representation of short-horizon returns. This could lead to the development of universal feature libraries for crypto markets, enhancing trading strategies.

high_signal_items.title: A unified theory of order flow, market impact, and volatility
high_signal_items.why_it_matters: The proposed microstructural model reconciles empirical properties like persistent signed order flow and rough volatility, providing a framework to understand market dynamics better. This could improve trading strategies by predicting market impact and volatility more accurately.

high_signal_items.title: Generative AI for Stock Selection
high_signal_items.why_it_matters: The use of generative AI for feature discovery in stock selection shows significant improvements in Sharpe ratios, indicating potential for enhanced stock selection strategies with reduced manual effort.

new_agent_ideas.edge_hypothesis: Exploiting stable cross-asset patterns in cryptocurrency microstructure can lead to profitable arbitrage opportunities.
new_agent_ideas.test_plan: Implement a backtesting framework using historical Binance Futures data to validate the arbitrage strategy.

new_agent_ideas.edge_hypothesis: Using a unified theory of order flow and volatility can improve predictions of market volatility, enhancing options trading strategies.
new_agent_ideas.test_plan: Develop a predictive model using historical order flow data and validate it against realized volatility.

new_agent_ideas.edge_hypothesis: Generative AI can discover novel features that improve stock selection, leading to better risk-adjusted returns.
new_agent_ideas.test_plan: Integrate AI-generated features into a stock selection model and compare performance against traditional models.

new_data_sources.name: Binance Futures Order Book Data
new_data_sources.use_case: Used for analyzing cryptocurrency microstructure patterns and developing arbitrage strategies.

new_data_sources.name: Historical Order Flow Data
new_data_sources.use_case: Essential for developing models to predict market volatility and impact.

new_data_sources.name: Analyst Reports and Options Data
new_data_sources.use_case: Used in generative AI models for discovering new features for stock selection.
